de.topicmapslab.tmql4j.delete.util
Class DeletionHandler

java.lang.Object
  de.topicmapslab.tmql4j.delete.util.DeletionHandler

public class DeletionHandler
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class to handle the deletion of topic map items. Class handles all operation which will be proceeded during the interpretation of a delete-expression.

Author:
Sven Krosse

Returns:
a number of elements which was removed

                   boolean cascade)
            throws DeletionException
Method removes the given content from the internal topic map.

Parameters:
matches - a set of items which shall be removed
cascade - flag if dependent content shall also removed
